law.text: The court before whom such cause may be pending may restrain waste or destruction of the premises, and may enforce its order by fine and imprisonment or either.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 321, effective January 2, 1978. -- Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 467.
